meanings.definition: A representation of the external form of a person or thing in art.
meanings.sent1: The artist painted a beautiful image of a flower.
meanings.sent2: She kept a small image of her family in her wallet.
meanings.sent3: The image of a talking dog in the painting made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was an image of warmth in a cold world.
meanings.sent5: The image of the sunset was so vivid, it felt like you could touch it.

meanings.sent1: The image of a beach vacation helped her relax.
meanings.sent2: His image of success included a corner office.
meanings.sent3: The image of a dancing elephant in his mind was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was an image of a lion's strength.
meanings.sent5: The image of a peaceful garden filled her thoughts with tranquility.

meanings.definition: A physical likeness or representation of a person or thing, photographed, painted, sculptured, or otherwise made visible.
meanings.sent1: She cherished the image of her grandmother in a photo frame.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a stunning image of a mountain landscape.
meanings.sent3: The image of a cat wearing sunglasses in the sculpture was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His courage was an image of a knight in shining armor.
meanings.sent5: The image of the waterfall in the painting seemed almost real.
